trans-unit.target: 绘图区域的大小以像素为单位，默认为640x480。除此之外，窗口的实际大小还包括为工具栏和状态栏保留的空间。调整窗口大小时，图将立即缩放以适合窗口的新大小。的QT终端秤整个情节，包括字体和线宽，并保持它的全球纵横比是恒定的。如果键入replot，请在终端工具栏中单击replot图标或键入新的绘图命令，新的绘图将完全适合窗口，并且字体大小和线宽将重置为其默认值。

trans-unit.source: The size of these symbols scales with the font size.
trans-unit.target: 这些符号的大小与字体大小成比例。

trans-unit.source: The size option can be used to set the size of the plot window. The size option will only apply to newly created windows.
trans-unit.target: 大小选项可用于设置绘图窗口的大小。大小选项只适用于新创建的窗口。

trans-unit.source: The size or aspect ratio of a plot may be changed by resizing the gnuplot window.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过调整gnuplot窗口的大小来更改图的大小或宽高比。

trans-unit.source: The special filename "-" may be used to load commands from standard input. This allows a gnuplot command file to accept some commands from standard input. Please see help for batch/interactive for more details.
trans-unit.target: 特殊文件名“-”可用于从标准输入中加载命令。这允许gnuplot命令文件接受来自标准输入的某些命令。请查看批处理/交互式的帮助以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The special filename "-" may be used to save commands to standard output. On systems which support a popen function (Unix), the output of save can be piped through an external program by starting the file name with a '|'. This provides a consistent interface to gnuplot's internal settings to programs which communicate with gnuplot through a pipe. Please see help for batch/interactive for more details.
trans-unit.target: 特殊文件名“-”可用于将命令保存到标准输出。在支持popen函数（Unix）的系统上，可以通过以'|'开头的文件名通过外部程序传递save的输出。这为gnuplot的内部设置（通过管道与gnuplot进行通信的程序）提供了一致的接口。请查看批处理/交互式的帮助以获取更多详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The special filename '-' specifies that the data are inline; i.e., they follow the command. Only the data follow the command; plot options like filters, titles, and line styles remain on the plot command line. This is similar to << in unix shell script, and $DECK in VMS DCL. The data are entered as though they are being read from a file, one data point per record. The letter "e" at the start of the first column terminates data entry.
trans-unit.target: 特殊文件名“-”指定数据为内联；即，他们遵循命令。仅数据遵循命令；绘图选项（如过滤器，标题和线条样式）保留在绘图命令行上。这类似于unix shell脚本中的<<和VMS DCL中的$ DECK。输入的数据就像从文件中读取一样，每条记录一个数据点。第一列开头的字母“ e”终止数据输入。

trans-unit.source: The special filenames '+' and '++' are a mechanism to allow the full range of using specifiers and plot styles with inline functions. Normally a function plot can only have a single y (or z) value associated with each sampled point. The pseudo-file '+' treats the sampled points as column 1, and allows additional column values to be specified via a using specification, just as for a true input file. By default samples are generated over the full range as set by set xrange, with the sampling controlled via set samples.
trans-unit.target: 特殊的文件名“ +”和“ ++”是一种机制，它允许内联函数全面使用说明符和绘图样式。通常，功能图只能与每个采样点关联一个y（或z）值。伪文件“ +”将采样点视为第1列，并允许通过使用规范指定其他列值，就像真正的输入文件一样。默认情况下，在set xrange设置的整个范围内生成样本，并通过set sample控制采样。

trans-unit.source: The special filenames "" and "-" are permitted, as in plot. See special-filenames.
trans-unit.target: 与plot一样，允许使用特殊的文件名“”和“-”。请参阅特殊文件名。

trans-unit.source: The spline and Bezier options determine coefficients describing a continuous curve between the endpoints of the data. This curve is then plotted in the same manner as a function, that is, by finding its value at uniform intervals along the abscissa (see set samples) and connecting these points with straight line segments. If the data set is interrupted by blank lines or undefined values a separate continuous curve is fit for each uninterrupted subset of the data. Adjacent separately fit segments may be separated by a gap or discontinuity.
trans-unit.target: 样条曲线和贝塞尔曲线选项确定确定描述数据端点之间连续曲线的系数。然后以与函数相同的方式绘制该曲线，即通过沿横坐标以均匀间隔找到其值（请参阅设置样本）并将这些点与直线段连接起来。如果数据集被空白行或未定义的值中断，则为数据的每个不间断子集拟合一条单独的连续曲线。相邻的单独拟合的段可能会被间隙或不连续分隔开。

trans-unit.source: The storage associated with named data blocks can be released using undefine command. undefine $* frees all named data blocks at once.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用undefine命令释放与命名数据块关联的存储。undefine $ *一次释放所有命名的数据块。

trans-unit.source: The string argument tells gnuplot how to read timedata from the datafile. The valid formats are:
trans-unit.target: 字符串参数告诉gnuplot如何从数据文件读取时间数据。有效格式为：

trans-unit.source: The string function gprintf("format",x) uses gnuplot's own format specifiers, as do the gnuplot commands set format, set timestamp, and others. These format specifiers are not the same as those used by the standard C-language routine sprintf(). gprintf() accepts only a single variable to be formatted. Gnuplot also provides an sprintf("format",x1,x2,...) routine if you prefer. For a list of gnuplot's format options, see format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 字符串函数gprintf（“ format”，x）使用gnuplot自己的格式说明符，gnuplot命令set format，set timestamp以及其他命令也是如此。这些格式说明符与标准C语言例程sprintf（）使用的格式说明符不同。gprintf（）仅接受要格式化的单个变量。如果您愿意，Gnuplot还提供了sprintf（“ format”，x1，x2，...）例程。有关gnuplot的格式选项的列表，请参见格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The styles splot with lines and splot with surface both generate a surface made from a grid of lines. Solid surfaces can be generated using the style splot with pm3d. Usually the surface is displayed at some convenient viewing angle, such that it clearly represents a 3D surface. See set view. In this case the X, Y, and Z axes are all visible in the plot. The illusion of 3D is enhanced by choosing hidden line removal or depth-sorted surface elements. See hidden3d and the depthorder option of set pm3d. The splot command can also calculate and draw contour lines corresponding to constant Z values. These contour lines may be drawn onto the surface itself, or projected onto the XY plane. See set contour.
trans-unit.target: 带有线的样式散点图和带有表面的样式散点图都生成由线网格制成的表面。可以使用pm3d样式样式生成实体曲面。通常，以某种方便的视角显示该表面，以便清楚地表示3D表面。参见设置视图。在这种情况下，X，Y和Z轴在图中均可见。通过选择隐藏线去除或按深度排序的表面元素，可以增强3D的幻觉。请参阅hidden3d和set pm3d的depthorder选项。该splot命令还可以计算并绘制与Z常数对应的轮廓线。这些轮廓线可以绘制在表面本身上，也可以投影到XY平面上。参见设置轮廓。

trans-unit.source: The success of gnuplot in producing the requested aspect ratio depends on the terminal selected. The graph area will be the largest rectangle of aspect ratio <r> that will fit into the specified portion of the output (leaving adequate margins, of course).
trans-unit.target: gnuplot成功生成所需的宽高比取决于所选的终端。图形区域将是宽高比<r>的最大矩形，它将适合输出的指定部分（当然要留有足够的边距）。

trans-unit.source: The surface can be switched off (see unset surface), giving a contour-only graph. Though it is possible to use set size to enlarge the plot to fill the screen, more control over the output format can be obtained by writing the contour information to a datablock, and rereading it as a 2D datafile plot:
trans-unit.target: 可以关闭该表面（请参阅未设置的表面），从而提供仅轮廓图。尽管可以使用设置大小来放大图以填充屏幕，但是可以通过将轮廓信息写入数据块，并将其重新读取为2D数据文件图来获得对输出格式的更多控制：

trans-unit.source: The symbol is a vertical line segment, located horizontally at the x coordinate and limited vertically by the high and low prices. A horizontal tic on the left marks the opening price and one on the right marks the closing price. The length of these tics may be changed by set errorbars. The symbol will be unchanged if the high and low prices are interchanged. See set errorbars and candlesticks, and also the finance demo.
trans-unit.target: 该符号是一条垂直线段，水平位于x坐标上，并且受到高价和低价的垂直限制。左侧的水平tic表示开盘价，右侧的tic表示收盘价。这些标记的长度可以通过设置的误差条来改变。如果高价和低价互换，该符号将保持不变。请参阅设置错误栏和烛台，以及财务演示。

trans-unit.source: The syntax for setting ranges on the splot command is the same as for plot. In non-parametric mode, ranges must be given in the order
trans-unit.target: 有关设置范围的语法splot命令是一样的情节。在非参数模式下，范围必须按顺序指定

trans-unit.source: The system command can be used to import external functions into gnuplot as shown below, however this will force creation of a separate subprocess every time the function is invoked. For functions that will be invoked many times it would be better to import a directly callable subroutine from a shared library. See import and plugin.dem.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用system命令将外部函数导入gnuplot，如下所示，但是，这将在每次调用函数时强制创建一个单独的子进程。对于将被多次调用的函数，最好从共享库中导入可直接调用的子例程。参见import和plugin.dem。

trans-unit.source: The tag is an integer that is used to identify the label. If no <tag> is given, the lowest unused tag value is assigned automatically. The tag can be used to delete or modify a specific label. To change any attribute of an existing label, use the set label command with the appropriate tag, and specify the parts of the label to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 标签是一个整数，用于标识标签。如果未给出<tag>，则自动分配最低的未使用标签值。该标签可用于删除或修改特定标签。要更改现有标签的任何属性，请使用带有适当标签的set label命令，并指定要更改的标签部分。

trans-unit.source: The ternary operator behaves as it does in C. The first argument (a), which must be an integer, is evaluated. If it is true (non-zero), the second argument (b) is evaluated and returned; otherwise the third argument (c) is evaluated and returned.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数(a)必须是一个整数,会被评估,如果是真(非零),第二个参数(b)会被评估并返回。如果它为真(非零),第二个参数(b)被评估并返回;否则第三个参数(c)被评估并返回。

trans-unit.source: The ternary operator is very useful both in constructing piecewise functions and in plotting points only when certain conditions are met.
trans-unit.target: 三元算子无论是在构造片断函数时,还是在绘制只有满足一定条件的点时,都非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The text in the key is set in enhanced mode by default, this can be changed with the {no}enhanced option, also independently for the key title only and for each individual plot.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，键中的文本设置为增强模式，可以使用{no} enhanced选项对其进行更改，也可以仅对键标题和每个单独的图单独进行更改。

trans-unit.source: The text support is based on a METAFONT character set. Currently the Computer Modern Roman font set is input, but the user is in principal free to choose whatever fonts he or she needs. The METAFONT source files for the chosen font must be available. Each character is stored in a separate picture variable in METAFONT. These variables may be manipulated (rotated, scaled etc.) when characters are needed. The drawback is the interpretation time in the METAFONT program. On some machines (i.e. PC) the limited amount of memory available may also cause problems if too many pictures are stored.
trans-unit.target: 文本支持是基于METAFONT字符集的。目前输入的是Computer Modern Roman字体集,但用户原则上可以自由选择他或她需要的任何字体。所选字体的METAFONT源文件必须是可用的。每个字符都存储在METAFONT的一个单独的图片变量中。当需要字符时,可以对这些变量进行操作(旋转、缩放等)。缺点是METAFONT程序的解释时间。在某些机器上(例如PC),如果存储了太多的图片,有限的内存也会造成问题。

trans-unit.source: The theory of non-linear least-squares (NLLS) is generally described in terms of a normal distribution of errors, that is, the input data is assumed to be a sample from a population having a given mean and a Gaussian (normal) distribution about the mean with a given standard deviation. For a sample of sufficiently large size, and knowing the population standard deviation, one can use the statistics of the chisquare distribution to describe a "goodness of fit" by looking at the variable often called "chisquare". Here, it is sufficient to say that a reduced chisquare (chisquare/degrees of freedom, where degrees of freedom is the number of datapoints less the number of parameters being fitted) of 1.0 is an indication that the weighted sum of squared deviations between the fitted function and the data points is the same as that expected for a random sample from a population characterized by the function with the current value of the parameters and the given standard deviations.
trans-unit.target: 非线性最小二乘法(NLLS)的理论一般用正态分布的误差来描述,即假设输入数据是来自一个具有给定均值的人群的样本,并且关于均值的高斯(正态)分布具有给定的标准差。对于一个规模足够大的样本,并且知道人口标准差,就可以用chisquare分布的统计量来描述一个 "拟合度",看这个变量通常叫做 "chisquare"。在这里,只需说一个降低的chisquare(chisquare/自由度,其中自由度是数据点的数量减去被拟合的参数数量)为1.0,就表明拟合函数和数据点之间的加权平方差之和与从人口中随机抽样的预期值相同,该随机抽样的特点是具有当前参数值和给定标准差的函数。

trans-unit.source: The third set of variables is only relevant to analysis of two data columns.
trans-unit.target: 第三组变量只与两个数据列的分析有关。

trans-unit.source: The third variant fills the area between two curves sampled at the same set of x coordinates. It requires three columns of input data (x, y1, y2). This is the default if there are three or more columns of input data. If you have a y value in column 2 and an associated error value in column 3 the area of uncertainty can be represented by shading. See also the similar 3D plot style zerrorfill.
trans-unit.target: 第三个变体填充在同一组x坐标处采样的两条曲线之间的区域。它需要三列输入数据（x，y1，y2）。如果输入数据有三列或更多列，则为默认设置。如果在第2列中具有y值，在第3列中具有相关的误差值，则不确定性区域可以用阴影表示。另请参见类似的3D绘图样式zerrorfill。

trans-unit.source: The three options specify where to draw the contours: base draws the contours on the grid base where the x/ytics are placed, surface draws the contours on the surfaces themselves, and both draws the contours on both the base and the surface. If no option is provided, the default is base.
trans-unit.target: 三个选项指定绘制轮廓：基座吸取其中x / ytics被放置在网格基础轮廓，表面绘制的表面本身上的轮廓，并且既平基部和表面二者上的轮廓。如果未提供任何选项，则默认值为base。

trans-unit.source: The tic marks at the ends of the bar are controlled by set errorbars.
trans-unit.target: 条形末端的刻度线由设置的误差线控制。

trans-unit.source: The tics may be turned off with the unset tics command, and may be turned on (the default state) with set tics. Fine control of tics on individual axes is possible using the alternative commands set xtics, set ztics, etc.
trans-unit.target: tic可以使用unset tics命令关闭，也可以使用set tics开启（默认状态）。使用备用命令set xtics，set ztics等可以对单个轴上的tic进行精细控制。

trans-unit.source: The title of the output window can be changed with the title option, if supported by the libcaca driver.
trans-unit.target: 如果libcaca驱动程序支持，则可以使用title选项更改输出窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: The total set of possible plots is a superset of the simple f(x) style plots, since the two functions can describe the x and y values to be computed separately. In fact, plots of the type t,f(t) are equivalent to those produced with f(x) because the x values are computed using the identity function. Similarly, 3D plots of the type u,v,f(u,v) are equivalent to f(x,y).
trans-unit.target: 所有可能的图集都是简单的f(x)式图集的超集,因为这两个函数可以分别描述要计算的x和y值。事实上,t,f(t)类型的图与f(x)类型的图是等价的,因为x值是用身份函数计算的。同样,u,v,f(u,v)类型的三维图也等同于f(x,y)。

trans-unit.source: The transpose and flip commands provide some flexibility in generating and orienting coordinates. However, for full degrees of freedom, it is possible to apply a rotational vector described by a rotational angle in two dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 转置和翻转命令在生成和定位坐标方面提供了一些灵活性。然而,对于完全的自由度,可以应用一个由二维旋转角描述的旋转矢量。

trans-unit.source: The two forms of the via argument to fit serve two largely distinct purposes. The via "file" form is best used for (possibly unattended) batch operation, where you supply the starting parameter values in a file.
trans-unit.target: 合适的过孔参数的两种形式有两个截然不同的目的。在通过“文件”形式最好用于（可能无人值守）间歇操作，在这里在一个文件中提供的起始参数值。

trans-unit.source: The two-dimensional rotation is done first, followed by the three-dimensional rotation. That is, if R' is the rotational 2 x 2 matrix described by an angle, and P is the 3 x 3 matrix projecting (0,0,1) to (xp,yp,zp), let R be constructed from R' at the upper left sub-matrix, 1 at element 3,3 and zeros elsewhere. Then the matrix formula for translating data is v' = P R v, where v is the 3 x 1 vector of data extracted from the data file. In cases where the data of the file is inherently not three-dimensional, logical rules are used to place the data in three-space. (E.g., usually setting the z-dimension value to zero and placing 2D data in the x-y plane.)
trans-unit.target: 先进行二维旋转,再进行三维旋转。即如果R'是用角度描述的2×2旋转矩阵,P是投影(0,0,1)到(xp,yp,zp)的3×3矩阵,则让R由R'在左上角子矩阵处构造,在3,3元素处构造为1,其他地方为零。那么翻译数据的矩阵公式为v'=P R v,其中v为从数据文件中提取的3×1的数据向量。在文件的数据本身不是三维的情况下,采用逻辑规则将数据置于三维空间。如:通常将z维值设置为零,将二维数据置于x-y平面中)。

trans-unit.source: The use of on-the-fly range specifiers in a plot command may not yield the expected result for linked axes (see set link). It is better to use separate set xrange and set yrange statements instead.
trans-unit.target: 在plot命令中使用动态范围说明符可能不会产生链接轴的预期结果（请参阅set link）。最好改用单独的set xrange和set yrange语句。

trans-unit.source: The user defined variables described here are deprecated, see set fit.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用此处描述的用户定义变量，请参见set fit。

trans-unit.source: The usual convention for financial data is that the rectangle is empty if (open < close) and solid fill if (close < open). This is the behavior you will get if the current fillstyle is set to "empty". See fillstyle. If you set the fillstyle to solid or pattern, then this will be used for all boxes independent of open and close values. See also set errorbars and financebars. See also the candlestick
trans-unit.target: 财务数据的常规约定是：如果（open <关闭），则矩形为空；如果（close <打开），则为实心填充。如果当前的填充样式设置为“空”，则将出现这种情况。参见fillstyle。如果将fillstyle设置为实心或图案，则将其用于所有独立于打开和关闭值的盒子。另请参阅设置错误栏和财务栏。另见烛台

trans-unit.source: The variables FIT_SKIP and FIT_INDEX were used by earlier releases of gnuplot with a 'fit' patch called gnufit and are no longer available. The datafile every modifier provides the functionality of FIT_SKIP. FIT_INDEX was used for multi-branch fitting, but multi-branch fitting of one independent variable is now done as a pseudo-3D fit in which the second independent variable and using are used to specify the branch. See fit multi-branch.
trans-unit.target: 早期版本的gnuplot使用名为gnufi​​t的“适合”补丁程序使用了变量FIT_SKIP和FIT_INDEX，并且不再可用。数据文件的每个修饰符均提供FIT_SKIP的功能。FIT_INDEX用于多分支拟合，但是一个自变量的多分支拟合现在作为伪3D拟合完成，其中第二个自变量和using用于指定分支。请参阅适合多分支。

trans-unit.source: The variant "pause mouse key" will resume after any keypress in the active plot window. If you want to wait for a particular key to be pressed, you can use a reread loop such as:
trans-unit.target: 变体 "暂停鼠标键 "将在活动剧情窗口中的任何按键按下后恢复。如果你想等待某个特定的键被按下,你可以使用重读循环,如:。

trans-unit.source: The vgagl driver uses the first *available* vga mode from the following list:
trans-unit.target: vgagl驱动使用下面列表中第一个*可用的vga模式。

trans-unit.source: The width of all lines in the plot can be increased by the factor <n> specified in linewidth. Similarly dashlength is a multiplier for the default dash spacing.
trans-unit.target: 图中所有线的宽度都可以增加linewidth中指定的因子<n> 。同样，dashlength是默认虚线间距的倍数。

trans-unit.source: The width of all lines in the plot can be modified by the factor <lw> specified in linewidth. The default linewidth is 0.5 points. (1 "PostScript" point = 1/72 inch = 0.353 mm)
trans-unit.target: 可以通过linewidth中指定的因子<lw>修改图中所有线的宽度。默认线宽为0.5点。（1个“ PostScript”点= 1/72英寸= 0.353毫米）

trans-unit.source: The width of all lines in the plot can be modified by the factor <lw>.
trans-unit.target: 图中所有线的宽度可以通过系数<lw>修改。

trans-unit.source: The width of the box is obtained in one of three ways. If the input data has a third column, this will be used to set the width of the box. If not, if a width has been set using the set boxwidth command, this will be used. If neither of these is available, the width of each box will be calculated automatically so that it touches the adjacent boxes.
trans-unit.target: 盒子的宽度可以通过以下三种方式之一获得。如果输入数据具有第三列，它将用于设置框的宽度。如果没有，则使用set boxwidth命令设置宽度。如果这两个都不可用，则将自动计算每个框的宽度，以使其接触相邻的框。

trans-unit.source: The width of the rectangle can be controlled by the set boxwidth command. For backwards compatibility with earlier gnuplot versions, when the boxwidth parameter has not been set then the width of the candlestick rectangle is controlled by set errorbars <width>.
trans-unit.target: 矩形的宽度可以通过set boxwidth命令来控制。为了与早期gnuplot版本向后兼容，当未设置boxwidth参数时，烛台矩形的宽度由set errorbars <width>控制。

trans-unit.source: The word "title" occurs with multiple meanings in gnuplot. In this document, it will always be preceded by the adjective "plot", "line", or "key" to differentiate among them. A 2D graph may have up to four labeled axes. The names of the four axes are "x" for the axis along the bottom border of the plot, "y" for the axis along the left border, "x2" for the top border, and "y2" for the right border. See axes.
trans-unit.target: 在gnuplot中， “ title”一词具有多种含义。在本文档中，将始终在形容词“图”，“线”或“键”之前进行区分。一个2D图形最多可以具有四个标记的轴。四个坐标轴的名称分别为：“ x”代表沿图底部边框的轴，“ y”代表沿左侧边框的轴，“ x2”代表顶部边框，“ y2”代表右侧边框。参见轴。

trans-unit.source: The x axis may be drawn by set xzeroaxis and removed by unset xzeroaxis. Similar commands behave similarly for the y, x2, y2, and z axes. set zeroaxis ... (no prefix) acts on the x, y, and z axes jointly.
trans-unit.target: x轴可以通过设置xzeroaxis绘制，并通过未设置xzeroaxis移除。y，x2，y2和z轴的类似命令的行为类似。set zeroaxis ...（无前缀）共同作用于x，y和z轴。

trans-unit.source: The x coordinate must be specified. The order of the numbers must be exactly as given above, though the using qualifier can manipulate the order and provide values for missing columns. For example,
trans-unit.target: 必须指定x坐标。尽管使用限定符可以操纵顺序并为缺少的列提供值，但是数字的顺序必须与上面给出的完全相同。例如，

trans-unit.source: The x11 terminal supports enhanced text mode (see enhanced), subject to the available fonts. In order for font size commands embedded in text to have any effect, the default x11 font must be scalable. Thus the first example below will work as expected, but the second will not.
trans-unit.target: x11终端支持增强的文本模式（请参阅增强的），具体取决于可用的字体。为了使嵌入在文本中的字体大小命令生效，默认的x11字体必须是可缩放的。因此，下面的第一个示例将按预期工作，但第二个则无法。

trans-unit.source: The y error bar is a vertical line plotted from (x, ylow) to (x, yhigh). If ydelta is specified instead of ylow and yhigh, ylow = y - ydelta and yhigh = y + ydelta are derived. If there are only two numbers on the record, yhigh and ylow are both set to y. The x error bar is a horizontal line computed in the same fashion.
trans-unit.target: y 误差条是一条从(x,ylow)到(x,yhigh)的垂直线,如果指定了ydelta而不是ylow和yhigh,就会得出ylow=y-ydelta和yhigh=y+ydelta。如果指定了ydelta而不是ylow和yhigh,那么ylow=y-ydelta和yhigh=y+ydelta会被导出。如果记录上只有两个数字,则yhigh和ylow都设为y。x误差条是以同样的方式计算的水平线。

trans-unit.source: The y error bar is a vertical line plotted from (x, ylow) to (x, yhigh). If ydelta is specified instead of ylow and yhigh, ylow = y - ydelta and yhigh = y + ydelta are derived. If there are only two numbers on the record, yhigh and ylow are both set to y. The x error bar is a horizontal line computed in the same fashion. To get lines plotted between the data points, plot the data file twice, once with errorbars and once with lines (but remember to use the notitle option on one to avoid two entries in the key). Alternately, use the errorlines command (see errorlines).
trans-unit.target: y误差线是从（x，ylow）到（x，yhigh）绘制的垂直线。如果指定ydelta而不是ylow和yhigh，则推导ylow = y-ydelta和yhigh = y + ydelta。如果记录中只有两个数字，则yhigh和ylow都设置为y。x误差线是以相同方式计算的水平线。要在数据点之间绘制线条，请绘制数据文件两次，一次使用错误栏，一次使用线条（但请记住对其中一个使用notitle选项以避免在键中输入两次）。或者，使用errorlines命令（请参阅errorlines）。

trans-unit.source: The {{no}border} property of the fillstyle is honored by filledcurves mode closed, the default. It is ignored by all other filledcurves modes. Example:
trans-unit.target: 该{{}无边界}的填充样式的属性被filledcurves模式荣幸关闭，默认。所有其他filledcurves模式都将忽略它。例：

trans-unit.source: Then, the following line in a data file is completely ignored
trans-unit.target: 那么,数据文件中的以下一行就完全被忽略了

trans-unit.source: There are a few filenames that have a special meaning: ' ', '-', '+' and '++'.
trans-unit.target: 有几个文件名有特殊含义:''、'-'、'+'和'++'。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of environment variables that can be defined to affect fit before starting gnuplot, see fit control environment.
trans-unit.target: 在启动gnuplot之前，可以定义许多环境变量来影响拟合，请参见拟合控制环境。

trans-unit.source: There are four gnuplot commands which actually create a plot: plot, splot, replot, and refresh. Other commands control the layout, style, and content of the plot that will eventually be created. plot generates 2D plots. splot generates 3D plots (actually 2D projections, of course). replot reexecutes the previous plot or splot command. refresh is similar to replot but it reuses any previously stored data rather than rereading data from a file or input stream.
trans-unit.target: 有四种gnuplot的这实际上创建打印命令：剧情，splot，重制，并刷新。其他命令控制将最终创建的图的布局，样式和内容。图生成2D图。splot生成3D图（当然是2D投影）。重制重新执行前一个情节或splot命令。刷新与replot相似，但它会重用以前存储的所有数据，而不是从文件或输入流中重新读取数据。

trans-unit.source: There are four possible sets of axes available; the keyword <axes> is used to select the axes for which a particular line should be scaled. x1y1 refers to the axes on the bottom and left; x2y2 to those on the top and right; x1y2 to those on the bottom and right; and x2y1 to those on the top and left. Ranges specified on the plot command apply only to the first set of axes (bottom left).
trans-unit.target: 共有四组可能的轴。关键字<axes>用于选择应缩放特定线的轴。x1y1指的是底部和左侧的轴；x2y2到顶部和右侧；x1y2位于底部和右侧；和x2y1分别位于顶部和左侧。plot命令上指定的范围仅适用于第一组轴（左下）。

trans-unit.source: There are global default settings for the various binary options which may be set using the same syntax as the options when used as part of the (s)plot <filename> binary ... command. This syntax is set datafile binary .... The general rule is that common command-line specified parameters override file-extracted parameters which override default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 各种二进制选项都有全局默认设置，当用作（s）plot <filename> binary ...命令的一部分时，可以使用与选项相同的语法进行设置。这句法是一套数据文件的二进制...。一般规则是，通用命令行指定的参数会覆盖文件提取的参数，而文件提取的参数会覆盖默认参数。

trans-unit.source: There are separate format mechanisms for interpretation of time data on input and output. Input data is read from a file either by using the global timefmt or by using the function timecolumn() as part of the plot command. These input mechanisms also apply to using time values to set an axis range. See set timefmt, timecolumn.
trans-unit.target: 有用于解释输入和输出时间数据的单独格式机制。通过使用全局timefmt或通过使用函数timecolumn（）作为plot命令的一部分从文件中读取输入数据。这些输入机制还适用于使用时间值设置轴范围。请参阅set timefmt，timecolumn。

trans-unit.source: There are some problem cases that arise when numbers like 9.999 are printed with a format that requires both rounding and a power.
trans-unit.target: 有一些问题情况下,像9.999这样的数字在打印时,其格式既需要四舍五入,又需要一个幂。

trans-unit.source: There are three alternatives: if units xy is included in the plot specification, the axes will be scaled as described above. units xx ensures that both diameters are interpreted in units of the x axis, while units yy means that both diameters are interpreted in units of the y axis. In the latter two cases the ellipses will have the correct aspect ratio, even if the plot is resized.
trans-unit.target: 共有三种选择：如果绘图规范中包含单位xy，则将如上所述缩放轴。xx单位确保两个直径均以x轴为单位，而yy单位表示两个直径均以y轴为单位。在后两种情况下，即使调整图的大小，椭圆也将具有正确的纵横比。

trans-unit.source: There are two mechanisms for embedding data into a stream of gnuplot commands. If the special filename '-' appears in a plot command, then the lines immediately following the plot command are interpreted as inline data. See special-filenames. Data provided in this way can only be used once, by the plot command it follows.
trans-unit.target: 有两种机制可以将数据嵌入gnuplot命令流。如果在绘图命令中出现特殊的文件名“-”，则紧跟在绘图命令之后的行将被解释为嵌入式数据。请参阅特殊文件名。通过这种方式提供的数据只能通过其后的plot命令使用一次。

trans-unit.source: There are two mouse modes. The 2D mode works for plot commands and for splot maps (i.e. set view with z-rotation 0, 90, 180, 270 or 360 degrees, including set view map). In this mode the mouse position is tracked and you can pan or zoom using the mouse buttons or arrow keys. Some terminals support toggling individual plots on/off by clicking on the corresponding key title or on a separate widget.
trans-unit.target: 有两种鼠标模式。2D模式适用于绘图命令和splot地图（即组视图用z-0旋转，90，180，270或360度，包括集查看地图）。在此模式下，将跟踪鼠标的位置，您可以使用鼠标按钮或箭头键进行平移或缩放。一些终端通过单击相应的键标题或单独的小部件来支持打开/关闭各个图。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways that via can specify the parameters to be adjusted, either directly on the command line or indirectly, by referencing a parameter file. The two use different means to set initial values.
trans-unit.target: via可以通过两种方式直接在命令行上指定参数，也可以通过引用参数文件间接指定要调整的参数。两者使用不同的方法来设置初始值。

trans-unit.source: There is a single gray/color value associated to each drawn pm3d quadrangle (it contains a solid color, not a gradient). The value is calculated from z-coordinates the four corners according to corners2color <option>. 4 columns of data (x,y,z,color):
trans-unit.target: 每个绘制的pm3d四边形都有一个单独的灰度/颜色值（它包含纯色而不是渐变）。该值是根据corners2color <option>从四个角的z坐标计算得出的。4列数据（x，y，z，颜色）：

trans-unit.source: There is a single ternary operator:
trans-unit.target: 有一个单一的三元运算符。

trans-unit.source: There is a special file type called auto for which gnuplot will check if the binary file's extension is a quasi-standard extension for a supported format.
trans-unit.target: 有一种名为auto的特殊文件类型，gnuplot会针对该文件类型检查二进制文件的扩展名是否为受支持格式的准标准扩展名。

trans-unit.source: There is also an option that will interpret the first entry in a column of input data (i.e. the column header) as a text field, and use it as the key title. See datastrings. This can be made the default by specifying set key autotitle columnhead.
trans-unit.target: 还有一个选项将输入数据列（即列标题）中的第一个条目解释为文本字段，并将其用作键标题。请参阅数据字符串。通过指定set key autotitle columnhead可以将其设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: There is also an option that will interpret the first entry in a column of input data (i.e. the column heading) as a text field, and use it as the key title for data plotted from that column. The example given below will use the first entry in column 2 to generate a title in the key box, while processing the remainder of columns 2 and 4 to draw the required line:
trans-unit.target: 还有一个选项可以将输入数据列中的第一个条目(即列标题)解释为一个文本字段,并将其用作从该列绘制数据的关键标题。下面给出的例子将使用第2列中的第一个条目在关键框中生成标题,同时处理第2列和第4列的其余部分来绘制所需的线条。

trans-unit.source: There is nothing restricting the inherent mapping from point/line/plane to apply only to Cartesian coordinates. For this reason there are cylindrical coordinate synonyms for the qualifier codes where t (theta), r and z are analogous to the x, y and z of Cartesian coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何东西限制点/线/平面的固有映射只适用于笛卡尔坐标。因此,限定码有圆柱坐标同义词,其中t(θ)、r和z类似于笛卡尔坐标的x、y和z。

trans-unit.source: These commands are known to be unreliable.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知,这些命令是不可靠的。

trans-unit.source: These commands produce an output file "figure.png" that is 600 pixels wide and 400 pixels tall. The plot will fill the lower left quarter of this canvas. This is consistent with the way multiplot mode has always worked.
trans-unit.target: 这些命令产生一个600像素宽、400像素高的输出文件 "figure.png"。绘图将填满这个画布的左下角。这与多图模式一直以来的工作方式一致。

trans-unit.source: These default properties may be changed using the set style boxplot command. See set style boxplot, boxwidth, errorbars, fillstyle, candlesticks.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用set style boxplot命令更改这些默认属性。见定式箱线图，boxwidth，errorbars，填充样式，烛台。

trans-unit.source: These settings apply to the wgnuplot text-window only. The TextOrigin and TextSize entries specify the location and size of the text window. If TextMaximized is non-zero, the window will be maximized.
trans-unit.target: 这些设置仅适用于wgnuplot文本窗口。该TextOrigin和TEXTSIZE条目指定文本窗口的位置和大小。如果TextMaximized不为零，则窗口将最大化。

trans-unit.source: These terminals find and access fonts using the external fontconfig tool set. Please see the fontconfig user manual.
trans-unit.target: 这些终端使用外部fontconfig工具集查找和访问字体。请参阅fontconfig用户手册。

trans-unit.source: These triplets are then converted into gnuplot iso-curves and then gnuplot proceeds in the usual manner to do the rest of the plotting.
trans-unit.target: 然后将这些三元组转换为gnuplot等值曲线，然后gnuplot以常规方式进行其余的绘制。

trans-unit.source: These will generate labels with the current time and userid:
trans-unit.target: 这些将生成当前时间和用户ID的标签。

trans-unit.source: Theta
trans-unit.target: Theta

trans-unit.source: They can be changed either via the set cntrlabel command or by specifying the interval in the splot command itself
trans-unit.target: 可以通过set cntrlabel命令或通过在splot命令本身中指定间隔来更改它们

trans-unit.source: This can be overridden by the ~ /.gnuplot (or equivalent) start-up file (see startup) and of course by later explicit set term commands.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用〜/.gnuplot（或等效文件）启动文件（请参见startup），当然也可以使用稍后的显式set term命令覆盖该文件。

trans-unit.source: This command applies to timeseries where data are composed of dates/times. It has no meaning unless the command set *data time is given also.
trans-unit.target: 此命令适用于数据由日期/时间组成的时间序列。除非也给出了设置数据时间的命令，否则它没有任何意义。

trans-unit.source: This command controls interpretation of data on the x axis. An analogous command acts on each of the other axes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令控制X轴上数据的解释。在其他各轴上也有类似的命令。

trans-unit.source: This command controls the appearance of labels with the attribute 'boxed'. Terminal types that do not support boxed text will ignore this style. Note: The current implementation is experimental; details may change. Implementation for some terminals (svg, latex) is incomplete. Most terminals cannot place a box correctly around rotated text.
trans-unit.target: 该命令控制带有'boxed'属性的标签的外观。不支持方框文本的终端类型将忽略这种样式。注意:当前的实现是实验性的,细节可能会改变。某些终端(SVG、latex)的实现还不完整。大多数终端无法在旋转的文本周围正确放置一个方框。

trans-unit.source: This command establishes forward and reverse mapping between the x and x2 axes. The forward mapping is used to generate x2 tic labels and x2 mouse coordinate The reverse mapping is used to plot coordinates given in the x2 coordinate system. Note that the mapping as given is valid only for x non-negative. When mapping to the y2 axis, both <expression1> and <expression2> must use y as dummy variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令在x和x2轴之间建立正向和反向映射。正向映射用于生成x2 tic标签和x2鼠标坐标。反向映射用于绘制x2坐标系中给定的坐标。注意，给定的映射仅对x非负有效。当映射到y2轴时，<expression1>和<expression2>都必须使用y作为伪变量。

trans-unit.source: This command governs whether the diameters of ellipses are interpreted in the same units or not. Default is xy, which means that the major diameter (first axis) of ellipses will be interpreted in the same units as the x (or x2) axis, while the minor (second) diameter in those of the y (or y2) axis. In this mode the ratio of the ellipse axes depends on the scales of the plot axes and aspect ratio of the plot. When set to xx or yy, both axes of all ellipses will be interpreted in the same units. This means that the ratio of the axes of the plotted ellipses will be correct even after rotation, but either their vertical or horizontal extent will not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 此命令控制是否以相同单位解释椭圆的直径。默认值为xy，这意味着将以与x（或x2）轴相同的单位解释椭圆的长直径（第一轴），而以y（或y2）轴的较小直径（第二直径）进行解释。在此模式下，椭圆轴的比例取决于绘图轴的比例和绘图的纵横比。当设置为xx或yy时，所有椭圆的两个轴将以相同的单位进行解释。这意味着，即使旋转后，绘制的椭圆轴的比例也将是正确的，但是垂直或水平范围都不正确。

trans-unit.source: This command graphically tests or presents terminal and palette capabilities.
trans-unit.target: 该命令以图形方式测试或显示终端和调色板功能。

trans-unit.source: This command has the same effect as left-clicking on the key entry for a plot currently displayed by an interactive terminal (qt, wxt, x11). If the plot is showing, it is toggled off; if it is currently hidden, it is toggled on. toggle all acts on all active plots, equivalent to the hotkey "i". toggle "title" requires an exact match to the plot title. toggle "ti*" acts on the first plot whose title matches the characters before the final '*'. If the current terminal is not interactive, the toggle command has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的效果与左键单击交互式终端当前显示的图（qt，wxt，x11）的键条目相同。如果显示该图，则将其关闭；如果当前处于隐藏状态，则将其打开。切换所有活动情节上的所有行为，等效于热键“ i”。切换“标题”需要与情节标题完全匹配。切换“ ti *”作用于标题与最后一个“ *”之前的字符匹配的第一个情节。如果当前终端不是交互式终端，则toggle命令无效。

trans-unit.source: This command has two functions. First, it sets the values of z for which contours are to be determined. The number of contour levels <n> should be an integral constant expression. <z1>, <z2> ... are real-valued expressions. Second, it controls the appearance of the individual contour lines.
trans-unit.target: 该命令具有两个功能。首先，它设置要为其确定轮廓的z的值。轮廓级别<n>的数量应为整数常量表达式。<z1>，<z2> ...是实值表达式​​。其次，它控制各个轮廓线的外观。

trans-unit.source: This command is EXPERIMENTAL. It has known limitations and implementation details may change.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令是实验性的。它有已知的限制,实施细节可能会改变。

trans-unit.source: This command is ambiguous. The initial range will be interpreted as applying to the entire plot, not solely to the sampling of the first function as was probably the intent:
trans-unit.target: 这条命令含糊不清。初始范围将被解释为适用于整个地块,而不是仅仅适用于第一个函数的取样,这可能是其本意。

trans-unit.source: This command is obsolete. Use set cntrlabel instead. unset clabel is replaced by set cntrlabel onecolor. set clabel "format" is replaced by set cntrlabel format "format".
trans-unit.target: 该命令已过时。请改用set cntrlabel。未设置的clabel被设置为cntrlabel onecolor代替。set clabel“ format”替换为set cntrlabel format“ format”。

trans-unit.source: This command places a label above the r axis. The label will be drawn whether or not the plot is in polar mode. See set xlabel for additional keywords.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在r轴上方放置一个标签。无论绘图是否处于极坐标模式，都将绘制标签。有关其他关键字，请参见set xlabel。

trans-unit.source: This command prepares a statistical summary of the data in one or two columns of a file. The using specifier is interpreted in the same way as for plot commands. See plot for details on the index, every, and using directives. Data points are filtered against both xrange and yrange before analysis. See set xrange. The summary is printed to the screen by default. Output can be redirected to a file by prior use of the command set print, or suppressed altogether using the nooutput option.
trans-unit.target: 此命令准备文件的一两列中数据的统计摘要。使用说明符的解释方式与绘图命令相同。有关index，every和using指令的详细信息，请参见plot。在分析之前，针对xrange和yrange过滤数据点。参见set xrange。默认情况下，摘要被打印到屏幕上。可以使用命令集print预先将输出重定向到文件，或者使用nooutput选项完全取消输出。

trans-unit.source: This command removes the ambiguity of the previous example by inserting the keyword sample so that the range is not applied to the entire plot:
trans-unit.target: 此命令通过插入关键字sample来消除上一示例的歧义，从而不会将范围应用于整个图：

trans-unit.source: This command sets the default radius used in plot style "with circles". It applies to data plots with only 2 columns of data (x,y) and to function plots. The default is "set style circle radius graph 0.02". Nowedge disables drawing of the two radii that connect the ends of an arc to the center. The default is wedge. This parameter has no effect on full circles. Clip clips the circle at the plot boundaries, noclip disables this. Default is clip.
trans-unit.target: 该命令设置打印样式“带圆圈”中使用的默认半径。它适用于仅包含两列数据（x，y）的数据图和功能图。默认值为“设置样式圆半径图0.02”。Nowedge禁止绘制将圆弧的两端连接到中心的两个半径。默认值为楔形。此参数对完整圆圈无效。Clip会在图的边界处修剪圆，noclip会禁用它。默认值为clip。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the label for the color box axis. Please see set xlabel.
trans-unit.target: 此命令设置颜色框轴的标签。请参阅set xlabel。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the label for the y axis. Please see set xlabel.
trans-unit.target: 此命令设置y轴的标签。请参阅set xlabel。

trans-unit.source: This command sets the label for the z axis. Please see set xlabel.
trans-unit.target: 此命令设置z轴的标签。请参阅set xlabel。

trans-unit.source: This command updates the current values of variables stored in the given file, which must be formatted as an initial-value file (see fit).
trans-unit.target: 此命令更新存储在给定文件中的变量的当前值，该变量必须格式化为初始值文件（请参阅fit）。

trans-unit.source: This conversion saves you a lot of time once you have generated the font; TeX handles the pictures as characters and uses minimal time to place them, and the documents you make change more often than the pictures do. It also saves a lot of TeX memory. One last advantage of using the METAFONT driver is that the DVI file really remains device independent, because no \special commands are used as in the eepic and tpic drivers.
trans-unit.target: 生成字体后,这种转换可以为你节省很多时间,TeX把图片作为字符处理,用最少的时间来放置图片,而且你做的文档比图片更经常变化。它还可以节省大量的TeX内存。使用METAFONT驱动程序的最后一个好处是,DVI文件实际上仍然是独立于设备的,因为没有像eepic和tpic驱动程序那样使用特殊命令。

trans-unit.source: This creates a plot of the sum of the 2nd and 3rd data against the first: The format string specifies comma- rather than space-separated columns. The same result could be achieved by specifying set datafile separator comma.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建第2个数据和第3个数据的总和与第一个数据的关系图：格式字符串指定用逗号而不是用空格分隔的列。通过指定set数据文件分隔符逗号可以实现相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: This describes the call mechanism used by older versions of gnuplot, now deprecated.
trans-unit.target: 这描述了旧版本的gnuplot所使用的调用机制,现在已经废弃。

trans-unit.source: This disables autoscaling of the x, y, z, x2 and y2 axes:
trans-unit.target: 这将禁用x、y、z、x2和y2轴的自动缩放。

trans-unit.source: This disables autoscaling of the z axis only:
trans-unit.target: 这将仅禁用Z轴的自动缩放功能。

trans-unit.source: This disables extension of the x2 axis tics to the next tic mark, thus keeping the exact range as found in the plotted data and functions:
trans-unit.target: 这将禁止将x2轴的井字扩展到下一个井字标记,从而保持绘图数据和函数中的精确范围。

trans-unit.source: This disables the key:
trans-unit.target: 这将使钥匙失效。

trans-unit.source: This discussion applies only to the special plot style with table.
trans-unit.target: 本讨论仅适用于带有table的特殊绘图样式。

trans-unit.source: This displays a plot of cos(x) stacked above a plot of sin(x).
trans-unit.target: 显示cos(x)的图叠加在sin(x)的图上。

trans-unit.source: This document may describe terminal types that are not available to you because they were not configured or installed on your system. To see a list of terminals available on a particular gnuplot installation, type 'set terminal' with no modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 本文档可能会描述一些因为没有在系统中配置或安装而无法使用的终端类型。要查看在特定的gnuplot安装中可用的终端列表,请键入 "set terminal",不要使用任何修饰词。

trans-unit.source: This draws an arrow from 100,-5 to 1000,5. For the logarithmic x axis, the relative coordinate 10 means "factor 10" while for the linear y axis, the relative coordinate 10 means "difference 10".
trans-unit.target: 这样就画出了一个从100,-5到1000,5的箭头。对于对数x轴,相对坐标10表示 "系数10",而对于直线y轴,相对坐标10表示 "差值10"。

trans-unit.source: This driver creates output for use with the TikZ package of graphics macros in TeX. It is currently implemented via an external lua script, and set term tikz is a short form of the command set term lua tikz. See term lua for more information. Use the command set term tikz help to print terminal options.
trans-unit.target: 该驱动程序创建输出，以与TeX中的图形宏的TikZ软件包一起使用。当前，它是通过外部lua脚本实现的，并且设置项tikz是命令设置项lua tikz的缩写。有关更多信息，请参见术语lua。使用命令集术语tikz help来打印终端选项。

trans-unit.source: This establishes a total range on x running from 0 to 1000 and then plots data from a file and two functions each spanning a portion of the total range:
trans-unit.target: 这将在x上建立一个从0到1000的总范围,然后从一个文件和两个函数中分别绘制总范围的一部分数据。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a "broken axis". X coordinates 0-100 are at the left, X coordinates 500-1000 are at the right, there is a small gap (10 units) between them. So long as no data points with (100 < x < 500) are plotted, this works as expected.
trans-unit.target: 本示例创建一个“断轴”。X坐标0-100在左边，X坐标500-1000在右边，它们之间有一个小的间隙（10个单位）。只要未绘制（100 <x <500）的数据点，此效果就可以预期。

trans-unit.source: This example defines a string-valued function that generates file names, and plots ten such files together. The iteration variable ('i' in this example) is treated as an integer, and may be used more than once.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子定义了一个字符串值的函数,用来生成文件名,并将十个这样的文件一起绘制出来。迭代变量(本例中的'i')被视为一个整数,并且可以被多次使用。

trans-unit.source: This example does exactly the same thing as the previous example, but uses the string iterator form of the command rather than an integer iterator.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子与前一个例子做的事情完全一样,但使用了命令的字符串迭代器形式,而不是整数迭代器。

trans-unit.source: This example establishes a log-scaled x axis. It is an alternative way of achieving the effect of set log x. The hidden axis in this case has range [0:3], obtained by calculating [log10(xmin):log10(xmax)]. You must provide both the forward and inverse expressions.
trans-unit.target: 本示例建立了对数缩放的x轴。这是获得set log x效果的另一种方法。在这种情况下，隐藏轴的范围为[0：3]，可通过计算[log10（xmin）：log10（xmax）]获得。您必须提供正向和反向表达式。

trans-unit.source: This example establishes a logit-scaled y axis such that plotting logit(x) on a linear x axis produces a straight line plot.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子建立了一个对数刻度的y轴,这样在线性x轴上绘制对数(x)就会产生一个直线图。

trans-unit.source: This example establishes a probability-scaled ("probit") x axis, such that plotting the cumulative normal function Phi(x) produces a straight line plot against a linear y axis.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子建立了一个概率标度("probit")x轴,这样绘制累积正态函数Phi(x)就会产生一个对线性y轴的直线图。

trans-unit.source: This example plots a family of functions.
trans-unit.target: 本例绘制了一个函数族。

trans-unit.source: This example plots the data in the file "population.dat" and a theoretical curve:
trans-unit.target: 本例绘制了文件 "population.dat "中的数据和理论曲线。

trans-unit.source: This example shows one way of tracing out a helix in a 3D plot
trans-unit.target: 这个例子展示了在3D图中绘制螺旋线的一种方法。

trans-unit.source: This example shows the use of a string-valued function to generate x-axis tick labels. Each point in the data file generates a tick mark on x labeled either "A" or "B" depending on the value in column 3.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子显示了使用一个字符串值的函数来生成x轴的刻度线标签。数据文件中的每个点都会根据第3列中的值在x轴上生成一个标记为 "A "或 "B "的刻度线。

trans-unit.source: This example shows use of labels with variable rotation angle in column 4 and textcolor ("tc") in column 5. Note that variable color is always taken from the last column in the using specifier.
trans-unit.target: 此示例在第4列中显示了旋转角度可变的标签的使用，在第5列中显示了textcolor（“ tc”）的注释。请注意，可变颜色始终取自using说明符的最后一列。

trans-unit.source: This example steps through a list and plots once per item. Because the items are retrieved dynamically, you can change the list and then replot.
trans-unit.target: 这个例子是通过一个列表,并对每个项目进行一次绘图。因为项目是动态检索的,所以你可以改变列表,然后重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: This fails because the double quotes prevent @machine_id from being interpreted as a macro. To store a system command as a macro and execute it later you must instead include the backquotes as part of the macro itself. This is accomplished by defining the macro as shown below. Notice that the sprintf format nests all three types of quotes.
trans-unit.target: 这样做是失败的,因为双引号阻止@machine_id被解释为宏。要将系统命令存储为宏并在以后执行,必须将反引号作为宏本身的一部分。这可以通过定义如下所示的宏来实现。注意,sprintf格式嵌套了所有三种类型的引号。

trans-unit.source: This family of terminal drivers supports a variety of VT-like terminals. tek40xx supports Tektronix 4010 and others as well as most TEK emulators. vttek supports VT-like tek40xx terminal emulators. The following are present only if selected when gnuplot is built: kc-tek40xx supports MS-DOS Kermit Tek4010 terminal emulators in color; km-tek40xx supports them in monochrome. selanar supports Selanar graphics. bitgraph supports BBN Bitgraph terminals. None have any options.
trans-unit.target: 该系列终端驱动程序支持各种类似VT的终端。tek40xx支持Tektronix 4010和其他产品以及大多数TEK仿真器。vttek支持类似VT的tek40xx终端仿真器。只有在构建gnuplot时选择以下内容，才能显示：kc-tek40xx支持彩色的MS-DOS Kermit Tek4010终端仿真器。km-tek40xx以单色支持它们。selanar支持Selanar图形。bitgraph支持BBN Bitgraph终端。没有任何选择。

trans-unit.source: This figure illustrates generation of a heat map from an array of scalar values. The current palette is used to map each value onto the color assigned to the corresponding pixel.
trans-unit.target: 该图说明了从标量值数组生成热图。当前调色板用于将每个值映射到分配给相应像素的颜色上。

trans-unit.source: This file can be plotted by
trans-unit.target: 该文件可以通过以下方式绘制

trans-unit.source: This form of the command is deprecated. Please see set style data.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用这种形式的命令。请参阅设置的样式数据。

trans-unit.source: This form of the command is deprecated. Please see set style function.
trans-unit.target: 不建议使用这种形式的命令。请参阅设置样式功能。

trans-unit.source: This graph of sin(x) will have a y range [-3:3] because the function will be autoscaled to [-1:1] and the vertical offsets are each two. The x range will be [-11:10] because the default is [-10:10] and it has been expanded to the left by 0.05 of that total range.
trans-unit.target: 这个sin(x)图的y范围是[-3:3],因为函数将被自动缩放为[-1:1],而且垂直偏移量是每两个。x的范围是[-11:10],因为默认值是[-10:10],而且它已经向左扩展了0.05的总范围。

trans-unit.source: This instructs the program to format all input and output in accordance with locale "foo", which must be installed. If locale "foo" is not found then an error message is printed and the decimal sign setting is unchanged. On linux systems you can get a list of the locales installed on your machine by typing "locale -a". A typical linux locale string is of the form "sl_SI.UTF-8". A typical Windows locale string is of the form "Slovenian_Slovenia.1250" or "slovenian". Please note that interpretation of the locale settings is done by the C library at runtime. Older C libraries may offer only partial support for locale settings such as the thousands grouping separator character.
trans-unit.target: 这指示程序按照必须安装的locale "foo "来格式化所有输入和输出。如果没有找到locale "foo",那么就会打印出一个错误信息,而小数点符号的设置是不变的。在linux系统上,你可以通过键入 "locale -a "来获得机器上安装的locale列表。一个典型的linux系统的locale字符串是 "sl_SI.UTF-8 "的形式。一个典型的Windows locale字符串的形式是 "Slovenian_Slovenia.1250 "或 "slovenian"。请注意,本地化设置的解释是由C库在运行时完成的。旧的C库可能只提供了部分对locale设置的支持,比如千位分组分隔符。

trans-unit.source: This instructs the program to use both input and output formats in accordance with the current setting of the LC_ALL, LC_NUMERIC, or LANG environmental variables.
trans-unit.target: 这指示程序根据LC_ALL、LC_NUMERIC或LANG环境变量的当前设置同时使用输入和输出格式。

trans-unit.source: This is a global setting that affects all ellipses, both those defined as objects and those generated with the plot command, however, the value of units can also be redefined on a per-plot and per-object basis.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个全局设置，会影响所有椭圆，无论是定义为对象的椭圆还是使用plot命令生成的椭圆，但是，还可以根据每个图和每个对象重新定义单位的值。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful for a repetition of similar commands.
trans-unit.target: 这对类似命令的重复特别有用。

trans-unit.source: This is similar except that the total range is established by the contents of the data file. In this case the sampled functions may or may not be entirely contained in the plot:
trans-unit.target: 除了总的范围是由数据文件的内容确定的以外,这也是类似的。在这种情况下,取样函数可能会或可能不会完全包含在图中。

trans-unit.source: This is the same, but uses t as the dummy-variable:
trans-unit.target: 这也是一样的,但使用t作为虚变量。

trans-unit.source: This is the simplest form of the command. It forces the x2 axis to have identically the same range, scale, and direction as the x axis. Commands set xrange, set x2range, set auto x, etc will affect both the x and x2 axes.
trans-unit.target: 这是命令的最简单形式。它强制x2轴具有与x轴相同的范围，比例和方向。命令set xrange，set x2range，set auto x等将同时影响x和x2轴。

trans-unit.source: This keyword allows you to skip sections of a binary file. For instance, if the file contains a 1024 byte header before the start of the data region you would probably want to use
trans-unit.target: 这个关键字允许你跳过二进制文件的部分。例如,如果文件在数据区域开始之前包含一个1024字节的头,你可能会想使用这个关键字来跳过二进制文件的部分。

trans-unit.source: This keyword serves the same function as array and has the same syntax. However, record causes gnuplot to not generate coordinate information. This is for the case where such information may be included in one of the columns of the binary data file.
trans-unit.target: 此关键字与数组具有相同的功能，并且具有相同的语法。但是，记录会导致gnuplot无法生成坐标信息。这是针对此类信息可能包含在二进制数据文件的一列中的情况。

trans-unit.source: This manual was originally prepared by Dick Crawford.
trans-unit.target: 本手册最初是由Dick Crawford编写的。

trans-unit.source: This mechanism can be used to define a set of personal preferences for the sequence of lines used in gnuplot. The recommended way to do this is to add to the run-time initialization file ~ /.gnuplot a sequence of commands like
trans-unit.target: 这个机制可以用来定义一组个人对gnuplot中使用的行的序列的偏好。推荐的方法是在运行时初始化文件 ~ /.gnuplot 中添加一系列命令,如

trans-unit.source: This option limits both the auto-generated axis tic labels and the corresponding plot border to the range of values actually present in the data that has been plotted. Note that this is independent of the current range limits for the plot. For example, suppose that the data in "file.dat" all lies in the range 2 < y < 4. Then the following commands will create a plot for which the left-hand plot border (y axis) is drawn for only this portion of the total y range, and only the axis tics in this region are generated. I.e., the plot will be scaled to the full range on y, but there will be a gap between 0 and 2 on the left border and another gap between 4 and 10. This style is sometimes referred to as a range-frame graph.
trans-unit.target: 此选项将自动生成的轴tic标签和相应的图边框都限制在已绘制的数据中实际存在的值的范围内。请注意，这与绘图的当前范围限制无关。例如，假设“ file.dat”中的数据全部在2 <y <4范围内。那么以下命令将创建一个绘图，仅对该部分绘制左侧绘图边框（y轴）在整个y范围内，仅生成该区域中的轴tic。即，该图将按比例缩放到y的整个范围，但是在左边界上将在0和2之间存在一个间隙，而在4和10之间将存在另一个间隙。这种样式有时称为范围框架图。

trans-unit.source: This places a key at coordinates 2,3.5,2 in the default (first) coordinate system:
trans-unit.target: 这将在默认(第一)坐标系的坐标2,3.5,2处放置一个键。

trans-unit.source: This places the key at the default location:
trans-unit.target: 这将钥匙放置在默认位置。

trans-unit.source: This places the key below the graph:
trans-unit.target: 这就把钥匙放在了图的下方。

trans-unit.source: This places the key in the bottom left corner, left-justifies the text, gives it a title, and draws a box around it in linetype 3:
trans-unit.target: 这将键放在左下角,对文本进行左对齐,给它一个标题,并在其周围画一个框,行式3。

trans-unit.source: This plot style can also be used to create fence plots. See fenceplots.
trans-unit.target: 此打印样式也可以用于创建围栅打印。请参阅fenceplots。

trans-unit.source: This plots "exper.dat" with errorbars and lines connecting the points (errorbars require three or four columns):
trans-unit.target: 这张图是 "exper.dat",有误差条和连接点的线(误差条需要三或四列)。

trans-unit.source: This plots "leastsq.dat" with impulses:
trans-unit.target: 这是用脉冲绘制 "leastsq.dat"。

trans-unit.source: This plots a surface with color lines:
trans-unit.target: 这是用颜色线绘制一个曲面。

trans-unit.source: This plots file "data" with points of type 3 and twice usual size:
trans-unit.target: 该图文件 "数据 "与点的类型3和通常的两倍大小。

trans-unit.source: This plots file "data" with variable pointsize read from column 4
trans-unit.target: 此图为文件 "数据",从第4列读取的变量点数

trans-unit.source: This plots filled curve of x*x and a color stripe:
trans-unit.target: 绘制x*x的填充曲线和彩色条纹。

trans-unit.source: This plots sin(x) and cos(x) with linespoints, using the same line type but different point types:
trans-unit.target: 使用相同的线型但不同的点型,用线点绘制sin(x)和cos(x)。

trans-unit.source: This plots sin(x) with impulses:
trans-unit.target: 这是用脉冲绘制sin(x)图。

trans-unit.source: This plots tan(x) with the default function style, file "data.1" with lines:
trans-unit.target: 此图为tan(x)的默认函数样式,文件 "data.1",行。

trans-unit.source: This plots the data file "population" with boxes:
trans-unit.target: 这是用方框绘制数据文件 "人口"。

trans-unit.source: This plots two color surfaces at different altitudes:
trans-unit.target: 这就绘制了两个不同海拔高度的颜色表面。

trans-unit.source: This plots two data sets with lines differing only by weight:
trans-unit.target: 该图绘制了两个数据集,其线条只因重量不同而不同。

trans-unit.source: This plots x squared with title "x^2" and file "data.1" with title "measured data":
trans-unit.target: 这将以标题为“ x ^ 2”的x平方和标题为“ measured data”的文件“ data.1”进行绘制：

trans-unit.source: This plots x with points, x**2 with the default:
trans-unit.target: 该图中x为点,x**2为默认值。

trans-unit.source: This plots x*x and a color box:
trans-unit.target: 本图为x*x和一个彩色框。

trans-unit.source: This plots y=x with the title 'x':
trans-unit.target: 此图为y=x,标题为 "x"。

trans-unit.source: This produces a layout in which the boundary of both left subplots is 5 character widths from the left edge of the canvas, the right boundary of the right subplots is 1 character width from the canvas edge. The overall bottom margin is one character height and the overall top margin is 2 character heights. There is no horizontal gap between the two columns of subplots. The vertical gap between subplots is equal to 2 character heights.
trans-unit.target: 这样产生的布局中,左边两个子图的边界距画布左边缘5个字符宽度,右边子图的边界距画布边缘1个字符宽度。整体底边距为一个字符高度,整体上边距为2个字符高度。两列子图之间没有水平间隙。子图之间的垂直间隙等于2个字符高度。

trans-unit.source: This section describes only the optional axis ranges that may appear as the very first items in a plot command. If present, these ranges override any range limits established by a previous set range statement. For optional ranges elsewhere in a plot command that limit sampling of an individual plot component see sampling.
trans-unit.target: 本节仅描述了可选的轴范围，这些范围可能显示为绘图命令中的第一项。如果存在，这些范围将覆盖由先前设置的范围声明建立的任何范围限制。有关限制单个绘图组件采样的绘图命令中其他位置的可选范围，请参见sampleing。

trans-unit.source: This section describes placement of the primary, auto-generated key. To construct a secondary key or place plot titles elsewhere, see multiple keys.
trans-unit.target: 本节介绍自动生成的主键的位置。要构建辅助键或将绘图标题放置在其他位置，请参见多个键。

trans-unit.source: This sets all input and output to use whatever decimal sign is correct for the current locale, but over-rides this with an explicit '.' in numbers formatted using gnuplot's internal gprintf() function.
trans-unit.target: 这将所有的输入和输出设置为使用任何正确的小数点符号,但在使用gnuplot内部的gprintf()函数格式化的数字中,用显式的'.'来覆盖。

trans-unit.target: 此项设置x、y、z、x2和y2轴的自动缩放。

trans-unit.target: 此项设置Y轴的自动缩放(其他轴不受影响)。

trans-unit.source: This sets both the x and y ranges:
trans-unit.target: 这设置了x和y的范围。

trans-unit.target: 这只设置了y的范围。

trans-unit.target: 这只设置xmax和ymin。

trans-unit.source: This setting is only relevant to PostScript output with UTF-8 encoding. It controls the names used to describe characters with Unicode entry points higher than 0x00FF. That is, all characters outside of the Latin1 set. In general unicode characters do not have a unique name; they have only a unicode identification code. However, Adobe have a recommended scheme for assigning names to certain ranges of characters (extended Latin, Greek, etc). Some fonts use this scheme, others do not. By default, gnuplot will use the Adobe glyph names. E.g. the lower case Greek letter alpha will be called /alpha. If you specific noadobeglyphnames then instead gnuplot will use /uni03B1 to describe this character. If you get this setting wrong, the character may not be found even if it is present in the font. It is probably always correct to use the default for Adobe fonts, but for other fonts you may have to try both settings. See also fontfile.
trans-unit.target: 此设置仅与使用UTF-8编码的PostScript输出有关。它控制用于描述Unicode入口点高于0x00FF的字符的名称。即，Latin1集以外的所有字符。通常，unicode字符没有唯一的名称。他们只有unicode识别码。但是，Adobe建议使用一种方案来将名称分配给某些范围的字符（扩展的拉丁语，希腊语等）。一些字体使用此方案，而另一些则不使用。默认情况下，gnuplot将使用Adobe字形名称。例如，小写希腊字母alpha将被称为/ alpha。如果您指定了noadobeglyphphnames然后gnuplot将使用/ uni03B1描述此字符。如果此设置错误，即使字体中存在该字符，也可能找不到该字符。对Adobe字体使用默认设置可能总是正确的，但是对于其他字体，您可能必须尝试两种设置。另请参见fontfile。

trans-unit.source: This version of gnuplot supports block-structured if/else statements. If the keyword if or else is immediately followed by an opening "{", then conditional execution applies to all statements, possibly on multiple input lines, until a matching "}" terminates the block. If commands may be nested.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的gnuplot支持块结构的if / else语句。如果关键字if or else紧随其后的是开头的“ {”，那么条件执行将应用于所有语句，可能在多个输入行上，直到匹配的“}”终止该块为止。如果命令可能嵌套。

trans-unit.source: To give gnuplot commands directly in the command line, using the "-persist" option so that the plot remains on the screen afterwards:
trans-unit.target: 要使用“ -persist”选项直接在命令行中提供gnuplot命令，以便随后将绘图保留在屏幕上：

trans-unit.source: To improve the chances of finding the global optimum, you should set the starting values at least roughly in the vicinity of the solution, e.g., within an order of magnitude, if possible. The closer your starting values are to the solution, the less chance of stopping at a false minimum. One way to find starting values is to plot data and the fitting function on the same graph and change parameter values and replot until reasonable similarity is reached. The same plot is also useful to check whether the fit found a false minimum.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高找到全局最优值的机会，您应该尽可能在解决方案附近至少大致设置起始值，例如，在一个数量级内。您的起始值越接近解决方案，停在错误最小值的机会就越小。查找起始值的一种方法是在同一张图上绘制数据和拟合函数，然后更改参数值并重新绘制，直到达到合理的相似度为止。同一图对于检查拟合是否发现错误的最小值也很有用。

trans-unit.source: To jitter along y (only) rather than along x, use keyword vertical.
trans-unit.target: 要沿y（仅）而不是沿x抖动，请使用关键字vertical。

trans-unit.target: 使用两个命令文件 "input1 "和 "input2 "启动一个批处理会话。

trans-unit.source: To launch an interactive session:
trans-unit.target: 启动互动环节。

trans-unit.target: 要使图形变成一半大小和正方形,请使用。

trans-unit.source: To make the graph twice as high as wide use:
trans-unit.target: 为了使图形两倍高的广泛使用。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the best output possible, the rendering involves three mechanisms : antialiasing, oversampling and hinting. Oversampling combined with antialiasing provides subpixel accuracy, so that gnuplot can draw a line from non-integer coordinates. This avoids wobbling effects on diagonal lines ('plot x' for example). Hinting avoids the blur on horizontal and vertical lines caused by oversampling. The terminal will snap these lines to integer coordinates so that a one-pixel-wide line will actually be drawn on one and only one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 为了获得最佳的输出,渲染涉及三种机制:抗锯齿、过采样和提示。过采样与反锯齿相结合,提供了亚像素的精度,因此gnuplot可以从非整数坐标中绘制一条线。这就避免了对角线(例如'plot x')的晃动效应。提示可以避免过采样造成的水平和垂直线的模糊。终端将把这些线捕捉到整数坐标,这样,一个像素宽的线实际上将被绘制在一个且仅有一个像素上。

trans-unit.source: To output degrees/minutes/seconds in a context other than axis tics, such as placing labels on a map, you can use the relative time format specifiers %tH %tM %tS for strptime. See time_specifiers, strptime.
trans-unit.target: 要在非轴运动的上下文中输出度/分/秒，例如在地图上放置标签，可以将相对时间格式说明符％tH％tM％tS用作strptime。请参阅time_specifiers，strptime。

trans-unit.source: To place the plot title at an arbitrary location on the page, use the form at <x-position>,<y-position>. By default the position is interpreted in screen coordinates; e.g. at 0.5, 0.5 is always the middle of the screen regardless of plot axis scales or borders. The format of titles placed in this way is still affected by key options. See set key.
trans-unit.target: 要将图标题放置在页面上的任意位置，请使用<x-position>，<y-position>形式。默认情况下，位置以屏幕坐标解释；例如，在0.5处，无论绘图轴刻度或边框如何，0.5始终是屏幕的中间。以这种方式放置的标题格式仍受关键选项影响。请参阅设置键。

trans-unit.source: To position the array somewhere else on the graph, the origin keyword directs gnuplot to position the lower left point of the array at a point specified by a tuple. The tuple should be a double for plot and a triple for splot. For example, origin=(100,100):(100,200) is for two records in the file and intended for plotting in two dimensions. A second example, origin=(0,0,3.5), is for plotting in three dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 要将数组放置在图形上的其他位置，origin关键字指示gnuplot将数组的左下位置定位在元组指定的点。元组应该是双重的情节和三联供splot。例如，origin =（100,100）:( 100,200）用于文件中的两个记录，并打算在两个维度上绘制。第二个示例origin =（0,0,3.5）用于绘制三维图。

trans-unit.source: To set a label on a graph with a timeseries on the x axis, use, for example:

trans-unit.source: To set an arrow from bottom left of plotting area to (-5,5,3), and tag the arrow number 3, use:
trans-unit.target: 要将绘图区域左下角的箭头设置为(-5,5,3),并标记箭头数字3,请使用。

trans-unit.target: 要用用户定义的线型5设置一个从原点指向(1,2)的箭头,请使用。

trans-unit.source: To set minor tics at arbitrary positions, use the ("<label>"<pos><level>, ...) form of set {x|x2|y|y2|z}tics with <label> empty and <level> set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 要将次要抽签设置在任意位置，请使用{{| x2 | y | y2 | z} tics的（“ <label>” <pos> <level>，...）形式，其中<label>为空，<level >设为1。

trans-unit.source: To set the number of levels to 10 (changing an incremental end or possibly the number of auto levels):

trans-unit.target: 设置绘图的大小,使其填满可用的画布。

trans-unit.target: 要简单的将y=0轴画成可视的。

trans-unit.source: To specify discrete levels at .1, .37, and .9:
trans-unit.target: 指定0.1、0.37和0.9的离散水平。

trans-unit.source: To specify explicit fillstyles for each dataset:
trans-unit.target: 为每个数据集指定明确的填充样式。

trans-unit.source: To specify levels from 0 to 4 with increment 1:
trans-unit.target: 指定级别从0到4,增量为1。

trans-unit.source: To understand positioning, the best concept is to think of a region, i.e., inside/outside, or one of the margins. Along with the region, keywords left/center/right (l/c/r) and top/center/bottom (t/c/b) control where within the particular region the key should be placed.
trans-unit.target: 要了解定位，最好的概念是考虑一个区域，即内部/外部或边距之一。与区域一起，关键字left / center / right（l / c / r）和top / center / bottom（t / c / b）控制应该在特定区域内放置关键字的位置。

trans-unit.source: To use a picture in a document, the METAFONT program must be run with the output file from gnuplot as input. Thus, the user needs a basic knowledge of the font creating process and the procedure for including a new font in a document. However, if the METAFONT program is set up properly at the local site, an unexperienced user could perform the operation without much trouble.
trans-unit.target: 要在文档中使用图片，必须使用gnuplot的输出文件作为输入来运行METAFONT程序。因此，用户需要字体创建过程和在文档中包括新字体的过程的基础知识。但是，如果在本地站点上正确设置了METAFONT程序，那么没有经验的用户就可以执行该操作而不会带来太多麻烦。

trans-unit.source: To use gamma correction with interpolated gradients specify intermediate gray values with appropriate colors. Instead of

trans-unit.target: 将PostScript命令写入文件 "foo.ps "中。

trans-unit.source: Two blank records in a row indicate a break between separate data sets. See index.
trans-unit.target: 一行中的两个空白记录指示单独的数据集之间的中断。参见索引。

trans-unit.source: Two keywords control whether or not every point in the plot is marked with a symbol, pointinterval (short form pi) and pointnumber (short form pn).
trans-unit.target: 两个关键字控制图中的每个点是否都标记有符号符号pointinterval（缩写为pi）和pointnumber（缩写为pn）。

trans-unit.source: Two styles of stacked histogram are supported, chosen by the command set style histogram {rowstacked|columnstacked}. In these styles the data values from the selected columns are collected into stacks of boxes. Positive values stack upwards from y=0; negative values stack downwards. Mixed positive and negative values will produce both an upward stack and a downward stack. The default stacking mode is rowstacked.
trans-unit.target: 支持两种样式的堆积直方图，由命令集样式直方图{rowstacked | columnstacked}选择。在这些样式中，来自选定列的数据值被收集到成堆的盒子中。正值从y = 0向上堆叠；负值向下堆叠。混合正负值会同时产生向上和向下的堆栈。默认的堆叠模式是rowstacked。

trans-unit.source: Unicode support depends on the driver and the terminal. The "x11" backend supports unicode since libcaca version 0.99.beta17. Due to a bug in libcaca<0.99.beta20, the "slang" driver does not support unicode. Note that libcaca<0.99.beta19 contains a bug which results in an endless loop if you supply illegal 8bit sequences.
trans-unit.target: Unicode支持取决于驱动程序和终端。从libcaca 0.99.beta17版本开始，“ x11”后端支持unicode。由于libcaca <0.99.beta20中的错误，“ s语”驱动程序不支持unicode。请注意，libcaca <0.99.beta19包含一个错误，如果您提供非法的8位序列，则会导致无限循环。

trans-unit.source: Usage in plot:
trans-unit.target: 情节用法：

trans-unit.source: Use <fontname> to specify the font (default is "Times-Roman"), and <fontsize> to specify the font size (default is 14.0 pt).
trans-unit.target: 使用<fontname>指定字体（默认为“ Times-Roman”），并使用<fontsize>指定字体大小（默认为14.0 pt）。

trans-unit.source: Use 24 bits of color information per pixel, with a transparent background. Use the enhanced text mode to control the layout of strings to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 每个像素使用24位颜色信息，并具有透明背景。使用增强的文本模式来控制要打印的字符串的布局。

trans-unit.source: Use header for any additional settings/definitions/macros that you might want to include in a standalone graphic. noheader is the default.
trans-unit.target: 将标头用于您可能希望包含在独立图形中的任何其他设置/定义/宏。noheader是默认值。

trans-unit.source: Use positive and negative to invert the figure colors.
trans-unit.target: 使用正和负反转图形的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Use set mouse mouseformat "" to turn this string off again.
trans-unit.target: 使用set mouse mouseformat“”再次关闭此字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use set palette functions <Rexpr>, <Gexpr>, <Bexpr> to define three formulae for the R(gray), G(gray) and B(gray) mapping. The three formulae may depend on the variable gray which will take values in [0,1] and should also produce values in [0,1]. Please note that <Rexpr> might be a formula for the H-value if HSV color space has been chosen (same for all other formulae and color spaces).
trans-unit.target: 使用设置的调色板函数<Rexpr>，<Gexpr>，<Bexpr>为R（灰色），G（灰色）和B（灰色）映射定义三个公式。这三个公式可能取决于灰色变量，该变量将采用[0,1]中的值，并且还应产生[0,1]中的值。请注意，如果选择了HSV颜色空间，<Rexpr>可能是H值的公式（所有其他公式和颜色空间都相同）。

trans-unit.source: Use show palette gradient to display the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 使用显示调色板渐变来显示渐变。

trans-unit.source: Use Helvetica, boldface, italics:
trans-unit.target: 使用Helvetica、黑体、斜体。

trans-unit.source: Use T1 fontencoding, change the text and math font to Times-Roman as well as the sans-serif font to Helvetica:
trans-unit.target: 使用T1字体编码,将文字和数学字体改为Times-Roman,以及无衬线字体改为Helvetica。

trans-unit.source: Use Times-Roman boldface (with the same shape as in the surrounding text):
trans-unit.target: 使用Times-Roman黑体字(形状与周围文字相同)。

trans-unit.source: Use a boldface font in the plot, not influencing the text outside the plot:
trans-unit.target: 剧情中使用黑体字,不影响剧情外的文字。

trans-unit.source: Use small capitals:
trans-unit.target: 使用小写字母。

trans-unit.source: Use the medium size built-in non-scaleable, non-rotatable font. Use white (24 bit RGB in hexadecimal) for the non-transparent background.
trans-unit.target: 使用中等大小的内置不可缩放、不可旋转的字体。使用白色(24位RGB的十六进制)作为不透明的背景。

trans-unit.source: Use the medium size built-in non-scaleable, non-rotatable font. Use white (24-bit RGB in hexadecimal) for the non-transparent background.
trans-unit.target: 使用中等大小的内置不可缩放、不可旋转的字体。使用白色(24位RGB的十六进制)作为不透明的背景。

trans-unit.source: Using the optional <linestyle>, <linetype>, <linewidth>, <linecolor>, and <dashtype> specifiers, the way the border lines are drawn can be influenced (limited by what the current terminal driver supports). Besides the border itself, this line style is used for the tics, independent of whether they are plotted on the border or on the axes (see set xtics).
trans-unit.target: 使用可选的<linestyle>，<linetype>，<linewidth>，<linecolor>和<dashtype>说明符，可以影响边框线的绘制方式（受当前终端驱动程序支持的方式限制）。除了边框本身之外，此线型还用于tic，而与它们是绘制在边框上还是在轴上无关（请参阅set xtics）。
